definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: longing;—of woman for man, [[אֶל־אִישֵׁח תְּשׁוּקָתֵח]] Ge 3:16 (J); of man for woman, [[אֲנִי לְדוֹדִי וְאֵלַי תְּשׁוּקָתוֹ]] Ct So 7:11; of beast to devour, fig. [[אֵלֶיךָ תְּשׁוּקָתוֹ]] Ge 4:7 (J). (LXX a)postrofh/ Gn, e)pistrofh/ Ct, whence Nes:Marg. 6 prop. [[תְּשׁוּבָתֵח]] Ge 3:16, which Ball:Hpt reads in all; but how explain the unusual and striking word in MT?).
